metadata.title: Kamik Yukon 5
features: Leather uppers with a waterproof shell
00B 3M Thinsulate insulation for warm protection against the cold weather
description: The durable waterproof protection and reliable traction of the Kamik® Yukon 5 boot will keep you confident and steady on your feet wherever you go this season.
The durable waterproof protection and reliable traction of the Kamik® Yukon 5 boot will keep you confident and steady on your feet wherever you go this season.
Waterproof leather upper.
Waterproof leather upper.
Waterproof and lightweight synthetic RubberHe foot shell keeps out the wet elements.
Waterproof and lightweight synthetic RubberHe foot shell keeps out the wet elements.
200B 3M™ Thinsulate™ insulation for warm protection against the cold weather.
200B 3M™ Thinsulate™ insulation for warm protection against the cold weather.
Moisture-wicking lining removes sweat away from the skin for a drier, more comfortable foot environment.
Moisture-wicking lining removes sweat away from the skin for a drier, more comfortable foot environment.
Back pull loop for easy entry.
Back pull loop for easy entry.
Traditional lace-up system with six sturdy metal eyelets for a secure fit.
Traditional lace-up system with six sturdy metal eyelets for a secure fit.
Removable, molded EVA insole with treatment for underfoot comfort and an odor-free environment.
Removable, molded EVA insole with treatment for underfoot comfort and an odor-free environment.
GOOSE synthetic RubberHe outsole provides great grip and traction for a variety of surfaces.
